getInstance().Description: Create a list formatter that is appropriate for the default FORMAT locale.

getInstance(android.icu.util.ULocale).Description: Create a list formatter that is appropriate for a locale.

getInstance(java.util.Locale).Description: Create a list formatter that is appropriate for a locale.

Returns: the pattern with {0}, {1}, {2}, etc. For English, getPatternForNumItems(3) == "{0}, {1}, and {2}"
getPatternForNumItems(int).Description: Returns the pattern to use for a particular item count.

Parameters: Object: items to format. The toString() method is called on each.
Collection: items to format. The toString() method is called on each.
format(java.util.Collection<?>).Description: Format a collection of objects. The toString() method is called on each.

ClassDesc: Immutable class for formatting a list, using data from CLDR (or supplied separately). The class is not subclassable.
